title: Fact Check: Video of crowd in Surat shared as Delhi’s Daryaganj area | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A video post is doing the rounds on the internet that shows a crowded market and claims that it is from Delhi’s Daryaganj.

The caption of the post read: “दिल्ली के दरियागंज का हाल देखिए #ArvindKejriwal जी – #Social Distancing की धज्जियाँ उड़ाकर आप दिल्ली के हर निवासी को मौत के मुँह में धकेल रहे हैं मुख्यमंत्रीजी समय रहते संभल चाहिए और अपनी ज़िम्मेदारी समझिए”

NewsMobile fact-checked this post and found the claim made to be fake.

When we put the keyframes of the viral video through Reverse Image Search, we came across a tweet by Surat MLA Harsh Sanghavi, dated April 26, 2020, which had featured the same video.

According to the tweet, the video in question is from Limbayat, Surat.

Hence, it is clear that the video in question is not from Delhi’s Daryaganj but from a market in Surat, Gujarat.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
